title: Palladium armor
summaries: Palladium armor is a Hardmode armor set crafted from Palladium Bars. It is the alternative to Cobalt armor. Like many Hardmode armor sets, Palladium armor has three different headpiece options, allowing players to focus on magic, melee, or ranged combat.

With the full set equipped, hitting an enemy grants the Rapid Healing buff, which heals 2 / 3 health per second. This lasts for 5 seconds, but can be canceled at any time by right-clicking the icon ([img:Desktop version] [img:Legacy tModLoader version]), by selecting the icon and canceling it in the equipment menu ([img:Console version] [img:Old-gen console version]), by double-tapping the buff icon ([img:Mobile version]), or by canceling the buff from the buffs screen ([img:Nintendo 3DS version]). Further attacks will refresh the duration. The buff is not canceled if the armor is removed.
Crafting a one-headpiece set requires 54 Palladium Bars, or 162 Palladium Ore. Crafting all five pieces requires 78 Palladium Bars, or 234 Palladium Ore.
